entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Automatically register and improve CLI completions for the dotnet CLI #42397
  • CLI - `dotnet workload restore` fails on solution if there is a .dcproj for Docker #42394
  • After updating .NET 8.0.304 SDK to .NET 8.0.400 SDK, running dotnet workload update failed to update workload manifests #42390
  • [FeatureRequest] Extend support for AssemblyDependencyResolver to NativeAoT and other platforms #42389

Closed

  • dotnet build /p:ContinuousIntegrationBuild=true doesn't work #16325
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Misc updates to the WriteSbrpUsageReport task #42405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exclude Directory.Build.rsp from .gitignore template #42401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stop generating precomputed rar cache #42385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • RC Branding #42281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Mark the SDK as torn only if MSBuild is older #42388
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Avoid "missing toolset" error in design-time builds #42396
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Remove Node-Externals allowed binary #42399
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42393
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add false positive license scan to exclusions list #42380
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid "missing toolset" error in design-time builds #42360
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip flaky test #42382
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Forward port 41996 #42315
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [8.0.1xx] No .deps.json for net472 Container task #42317
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.9
  • Add -pack support for the build CLI so that the zips/msi/packages aren't built by default #42384
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the corext overlay package as it's not used anymore as far as we know #42326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update aspire manifest to 8.1.0 #42364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enabled NativeAOT for Arm in SourceBuild/content/repo-projects/sdk.proj #42351
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
